mil.nga.giat.geowave.datastore.accumulo.util

Class AccumuloUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.datastore.accumulo.util.AccumuloUtils

  • public class AccumuloUtils
extends Object
    A set of convenience methods for common operations on Accumulo within GeoWave, such as conversions between GeoWave objects and corresponding Accumulo objects.
